about_the_game:
Last mile - is a first-person horror game where you are the driver. Your goal is to escape a spatial anomaly using your vehicle. As you progress, you’ll explore an abandoned highway while avoiding the threats that await you.

Immersive Experience

First-person vehicle control in harsh nighttime conditions will immerse you in the game’s somber atmosphere. The action takes place on an old abandoned road, a small town and a remote village.

Gameplay

This game is a vehicle simulation with horror elements. You’ll need to navigate through terrifying anomalies that have taken over the highway.
Explore and interact with the world:

  • Escape monsters in your car and keep an eye on your vehicle’s devices.

  • Use the radio, GPS, detectors and headlights to minimize collisions with anomalies and monsters. However, don’t forget to monitor your battery level - if it runs out, your equipment could shut down at the worst possible moment.

  • Solve mysteries scattered along the highway. You need to listen to old audio recordings and look through notes to uncover the reason behind these anomalies.

  • Step out of your car at certain locations to examine them and gather resources that will help you overcome the anomalies.

  • Communicate with various characters to gain more new insights.

Research of individual areas

As the game progresses, you’ll have the opportunity to use devices and items found during your trips. It’s up to you to decide whether to stop and explore an area. You’ll have to leave your car, or to drive past. Every upgrade will bring you closer to understanding the origins of the anomalies and how to fight them.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-2500 @3.3 GHz / AMD AMD Phenom II X6 1055T
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti / AMD Radeon HD 7870
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-11400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 / AMD RX 6600 XT / Intel Arc A770
